name: Myst III: Exile
description: The story of Myst continues... Return to this strange and wondrous universe, where books become portals into worlds, and where the lessons of the past may yet hold meaning for today...
minimum_requirements: OS: 7 / 8 / 10 Processor: 1.8 GHz Processor Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: 8 MB 3D graphics card compatible with DirectX 9 DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 5 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX 9 compliant audio device Additional Notes: Peripherals: Mouse, Keyboard
